name: Huge 300 Backdrop Bundle
description:
This bundle contains 300 all-new backdrops in a wide variety of categories.  This is a great place to start your backdrop collection, as you get a bit of everything, including Studio backdrops, Fantasy and Castle images, Gothic, Grunge, Sports, Landscapes, Cityscapes, and Cloudscapes, etc.  Each image in this digital backdrop collection is provided at a resolution of 2000 x 3000 pixels in JPEG format, so they will work excellently with FXhome PhotoKey, or with any other image editor you want to use.  A selection of the images can be seen in the thumbnails, but unfortunately I couldn't fit them all.

These images are designed to be used as backgrounds for greenscreen photographs, in software such as FXhome's PhotoKey line.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Sports Card Templates
description:
This pack contains a collection of Templates for PhotoKey 6 and 6 Pro for creating your own Sports cards.  These are excellent for shooting school sports teams, and are fully customizable.    They include designs for Baseball, Football, Soccer, Basketball, and Hockey, but could be used for other sports too, should you desire.

The templates come in the form of PhotoKey project files, and could be used with green screen photography or normal sports photos.  The Overlay images included could also be used in older versions of PhotoKey, or in other image editing programs.

• 20 Overlay variations on 10 main card designs
• 16 Background images
• Custom Logos for 5 different sports
• An assortment of vintage and modern styles
• 4 Vintage Overlays, to distress or age your cards
• Guide To Usage document includes tips for getting the most out of each template

The template files and images are optimized for the standard 2.5" x 3.5" collectible card size, at 300 DPI.

name: Studio Backdrops - Volume 2
description:
Our Studio series digital backdrops evoke the subtly blended colors of studio muslins, and are suitable for a wide variety or portraiture and other studio work.  Volume 2 includes 50 high quality JPEG images at a resolution of 2588 x 3888, in portrait orientation.  Previews of all 50 can be seen in the images provided.

These images are designed to be used as backgrounds in greenscreen photography, using software such as the FXhome PhotoKey line.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Winter Backdrops
description:
A collection of snowy backdrops you can use to create a winter wonderland.  This assortment features both photographic and beautifully crafted images for you to use in your greenscreen projects over the winder months, or any time you prefer.  Includes 50 high quality JPEG images at a new higher resolution of 3456 x 5184.  40 in portrait orientation, and 10 in landscape format.  Previews of all 50 can be seen in the images.  Our collection of Winter Overlays are designed to work in conjunction with these images and give added depth to your composites. 

These images are designed to be used as backgrounds for greenscreen photographs, in software such as FXhome's PhotoKey line.  The images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Winter Overlays
description:
This collection of 15 Overlays is designed to be used along with our Winter Backdrops collection, but could be used with other backdrop images as well.  15 Images are included; 10 Portrait and 5 landscape, all in a high resolution of 3456 x 5184, the same as our Winter Backdrops.

5 of these overlays are designed to work ideally with specific backdrops from our Winter Backdrop collection, and their file names indicate which images these are, so you can easily identify the associated files.

These images are provided in PNG format, with embedded alpha channels.  They can be composited in any software you prefer, but were designed for use in FXhome's PhotoKey line.  When imported as Overlays or Layers, the alpha transparency info in these files will be automatically implemented for perfect composites.

All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Fantasy Backdrops
description:
Our Fantasy series digital backdrops provide a touch of fairytale to your greenscreen composites.  An assortment of fantastic and dramatic images to add grandeur and splendor to your greenscreen projects.  This set includes 50 high quality JPEG images at a resolution of 2588 x 3888.  37 in portrait orientation, and 13 in landscape format.  Previews of all 50 can be seen in the images.

These images are designed to be used as backgrounds for greenscreen photographs, in software such as FXhome's PhotoKey line.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Creepy Backdrops
description:
Our Creepy series digital backdrops create a dark, gloomy atmosphere for your greenscreen projects.  Bats, spiderwebs, gargoyles, derelict mansions, and more are included in this set of 50 high quality JPEG images at a resolution of 2588 x 3888.  40 images in portrait orientation, and 10 in landscape orientation. These images are designed to be used as backgrounds for greenscreen photographs, in software such as FXhome's PhotoKey line.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Pirate Overlay Elements - No Text
description:
These pirate-themed overlays are specifically designed to be as versatile as possible.  This collection contains a variety of 15 background banners, in 4 different shapes, plus 5 variations of a skull and crossed swords logo. We recommend that these images be imported into FXhome PhotoKey using the Layers toolset, so you can combine various combinations of banners and logos.  Then you can add whatever text you want, using PhotoKey's text tools.  The width of each of the banner overlays is approximately 5000 pixels, so they can be scaled to fit virtually any image.

These overlays were designed to work perfectly with the FXhome PhotoKey line of keying software, but should work just as well in whatever compositing software you prefer.

All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Transformed - Prom and Graduation Overlays
description:
This is a collection of overlays designed for use with school or graduation portraits. They include Prom, Homecoming, and Graduation specific text, inspired by the logo of a popular film series. The included overlays are designed for the years 2012 through 2016. Each image can be imported into FXhome PhotoKey either as an Overlay or using the Layers toolset (recommended). The width of each of the 60 included overlays is approximately 5000 pixels, so they can be scaled to fit virtually any image.

These overlays were designed to work perfectly with the FXhome PhotoKey line of keying software, but should work just as well in whatever compositing software you prefer.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.

name: Studio Backgrounds Mini-pack 01
description:

All 10 images are shown in the first preview image, while the other preview images offer more detailed previews.

These images are designed to be used as backgrounds in greenscreen photography, using software such as the FXhome PhotoKey line.  All images are delivered digitally, and can be downloaded immediately after purchase.
